  Learning new things daily

Jing

Here is another one of those great “easy things” I love so much.

I am a huge fan of all things TechSmith, their tools just rock. I have been using their latest tool Jing for a couple of months now, primarily as a quick and easy to share videos of new functionality or to gather feedback on Graffiti.

The concept of Jing is the always-ready program that instantly captures and shares images and video…from your computer to anywhere.

I still use TechSmith’s SnagIt quite a bit, but with each passing day I am finding myself using Jing more and more. TechSmith is saying this project will turn into something else, so I am very curious to see how this turns out. I am currently in love with this service, so hopefully it is around to stay in some manor.

According to the Jing blog, a significant update is scheduled for tomorrow. For a quick overview, see the demo video.

Posted on Oct 09, 2007 and tagged as jing, techsmith, easy-things
